Package org.mt4j.input.inputSources

Interface Summary
IinputSourceListener The listener interface for receiving iinputSource events.
 

Class Summary
AbstractInputSource An abstract superclass for the abstraction of input sources.
KeyboardInputSource The Class KeyboardInputSource.
MacTrackpadSource Input source for Mac OS X Trackpads.
MouseInputSource The Class MouseInputSource.
MuitoInputSource The Class MuitoInputSource.
MultipleMiceInputSource The Class MultipleMiceInputSource.
TuioInputSource This class implements the TuioListener interface and generates TouchEvents with associated Cursors.
Win7NativeTouchSource Input source for native Windows 7 WM_TOUCH messages for single/multi-touch.
